name: Candy-mancy
description:
Controls:

Move - Arrow keys / WASD

Interact - Space

Use the mouse to match blocks in the battle scene! You can match 1, 2, or 4 (in square formation) blocks!

Credits:

Art - DJ Nguyen

Sound effects & main menu / exploration music - Willa Morgan

Boss battle music - Archifulk

Programming - Exuin

Made with Godot 3.3.3
